from vpython import *
import time

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=color.blue)
acceleration = vector(0, -9.8, 0)
velocity = vector(0, 0, 0)
ball.velocity = velocity

while True:
    rate(100)
    ball.velocity = ball.velocity + acceleration
    ball.pos = ball.pos + ball.velocity
    time.sleep(0.01)
